Target: OntoAssetManagement is an ontology that is designed to represent asset and its related information (e.g. purchase documents).

Comment: A legal document that authorizes the transportation of goods from one location to another.
Label: Delivery order

Comment: An official order used to inform department managers or purchasing officers about a decision to make a purchase.
Label: Purchase requisition

Comment: A document that list the bids or prices of an item (Product or service) offered by a business.
Label: Quotation

Comment: A document that summarizes the performance and other characteristics of a product, machine, component, material, subsystem, or software in sufficient detail.
Label: Data sheet

Comment: A document that summarizes the specifications of a product, machine, component, material, subsystem, or software in sufficient detail.
Label: Spec sheet

Comment: A document that provides step-by-step instructions for how to use a product, machine, component, subsystem, or software in sufficient detail.
Label: Manual

Comment: A document provided before or with a shipment of goods. It describes the items and terms of sale, but does not serve the function of a real invoice.
Label: Proforma invoice

Comment: This provides information on a document line level about the quantity of an item, price of an item and others for a delivery order.
Label: Delivery order line

Comment: This provides information on a document line level about the quantity of an item, price of an item and others for a purchase requisition.
Label: Purchase requisition line

Comment: This provides information on a document line level about the quantity of an item, price of an item and others for a quotation.
Label: Quotation line

Comment: A file that provides additional information pertaining to a document.
Label: Attachment

Comment: A space in which to work.
Label: Workspace

Comment: A party designated to make certain decisions and give/provide certain approvals.
Label: Approving party

Comment: A party designated to carry out evaluations and ensure that certain standards/requirements are met.
Label: Validating party

Comment: Terms pertaining to how and when customers pay for products or services.
Label: Payment terms

Comment: Details pertaining to the delivery of a product or service (e.g. estimated delivery date, delivery location).
Label: Delivery details

Comment: A payment levied on the import of goods.
Label: Import duties

Comment: A method of delivery for an item (e.g. products or services).
Label: Delivery method

Comment: Details pertaining to the price associated a purchase.
Label: Price details

Comment: A compulsory contribution to state revenue, levied by the government on workers income and business profits, or added to the cost of some goods, services, and transactions.
Label: Tax

Comment: A compulsory contribution to state revenue stated in percentage, levied by the government on workers income and business profits, or added to the cost of some goods, services, and transactions.
Label: Tax rate

Comment: A deduction from the usual price/cost of something.
Label: Discount

Comment: The amount of money expected, required, or given in payment for something.
Label: Price

Comment: Price per individual product or service.
Label: Unit price

Comment: Discounted price of one unit of a product or service.
Label: Discounted unit price

Comment: Total price of a purchase including discount and excluding tax.
Label: Total discounted pretax price

Comment: Total Price of a purchase including tax and discount, converted to a local currency.
Label: Home total discounted after-tax price

Comment: An attribute of an item that describes the service category it falls under.
Label: Service category

Comment: An attribute of an item that describes the service code it falls under.
Label: Service code

Comment: A relationship that describes the workspace allocated to a person.
Label: has allocated workspace

Comment: A relationship that describes the room in which a workspace is located in.
Label: is located in

Comment: A relationship that describes the address of an organization.
Label: has address

Comment: A relationship that describes the account in which an invoice or purchase order falls under.
Label: has reference account

Comment: A relationship that describes the party involved in a document.
Label: has concerned party

Comment: A relationship that describes the attachment of a document.
Label: has attachment

Comment: A relationship that describes something alluding to or referring to another thing.
Label: references

Comment: A relationship that describes when a document is created.
Label: created on

Comment: A relationship that describes the document line level of a purchase order.
Label: has purchase order line

Comment: A relationship that describes the document line level of a quotation.
Label: has quotation line

Comment: A relationship that describes the document line level of a purchase requisition.
Label: has purchase requisition line

Comment: A relationship that describes the document line level of a delivery order.
Label: has delivery order line

Comment: A relationship that describes the data sheet of an item or element.
Label: has data sheet

Domain: DeliveryOrder UNION PurchaseRequisition UNION Quotation UNION https://purl.org/p2p-o/document#PurchaseOrder UNION https://purl.org/p2p-o/document#E-Invoice
Comment: A relationship that describes the payment terms of a purchase related document.
Label: has payment terms

Comment: A relationship that describes the payment under a payment term.
Label: governs

Comment: A relationship that describes the amount of money in a payment.
Label: has amount

Comment: A relationship that describes the effective date of a payment. The date may be a past, present or future date.
Label: has effective date

Domain: DeliveryOrder UNION PurchaseRequisition UNION Quotation UNION https://purl.org/p2p-o/document#PurchaseOrder UNION https://purl.org/p2p-o/document#E-Invoice
Comment: A relationship that describes the delivery details listed in a purchase related document.
Label: has delivery details

Comment: A relationship that describes the estimated date of delivery of a product or service.
Label: estimated date of delivery

Comment: A relationship that describes the actual date of delivery of a product or service.
Label: actual date of delivery

Comment: A relationship that describes the import duties incurred by the delivery of a product or service.
Label: has import duties

Comment: A relationship that describes the method in which a product or service was/will be delivered.
Label: has delivery method

Comment: A relationship that describes the courier in charge of delivering the product or service.
Label: has courier

Comment: A relationship that describes the destination where a product or service will be delivered to.
Label: deliver to

Comment: A relationship that describes the location where a product or service is delivered from.
Label: deliver from

Comment: A relationship that describes the price details related to an item at the document line level or the delivery of a purchase.
Label: has price details

Comment: A relationship that describes a price component of the price details.
Label: has price

Comment: A relationship that describes a tax component of the price details.
Label: has tax

Comment: A relationship that describes a discount component of the price details.
Label: has discount

Comment: A relationship that describes a tax rate component of the price details.
Label: has tax rate

Comment: A relationship that describes something alluding to or referring to another thing.
Label: references

Comment: A relationship that describes an element being stored in another element.
Label: is stored in

Comment: A relationship that describe a person or oganization in which an asset is assigned to.
Label: assigned to

Comment: A relationship that describe the workspace where the asset is located at.
Label: is located at

Comment: A relationship that describes the supplier of a product or service.
Label: is supplied by

Comment: A relationship that describes the manufacturer of a product or service.
Label: is manufactured by

Comment: An identifier assigned to a workspace.
Label: has workspace identifier

Comment: External remarks of a document.
Label: has external remarks

Comment: Internal remarks of a document.
Label: has internal remarks

Comment: The URI where an attachment or data sheet is located at.
Label: available at

Comment: A reference number of a quotation.
Label: quotation number

Comment: A reference number of a purchase order.
Label: purchase order number

Comment: A reference number of a delivery order.
Label: delivery order number

Comment: A reference number of a purchase requisition.
Label: purchase requisition number

Comment: A reference number for tracking the delivery status of a product or service.
Label: tracking number

Comment: A unique identifier assigned incrementally or sequentially to an item, to uniquely identify it.
Label: serial number

Comment: A unique identifier assigned to an asset mainly for inventory management purposes.
Label: has item inventory identifier
